name: EPIC PIZZA
description:
EPIC PIZZA - The People of Calzonia are hungry for Pizza. You have to Race against Time to get it to them.

What if there was an Action/Adventure Movie about Delivering Pizzas and You Were the Star?
Well, Now You can find out!

This is a fun and challenging Race Game.
You have to Deliver Wave after Wave of Pizzas before the Clock Runs Out!

See the Game Features Below:

- Deliver Lots and Lots of Pizzas, but, Don't run out of Time!

- Get rid of a Ninja Gang!

- Enter a Race!

- Go on a Mission!

- Cool Minimap System!

- Extra Bonus Challenge: Hidden in one of the Buildings is a Special Easter Egg.
Can You Find it?

* NOTE: Don't Fall into the Water or You will have to start all over again. *
